txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken halberds from the goblins surrounding Tyrn Lhuig. Delivery of the items should be made to Othran at the base of the hilltop outpost.
'Cutting down those little menaces and breaking their weapons is a good thing to do. We will take whatever you break.'
Council of the North Task: Broken Halberds
The hunters at Tyrn Lhuig expect a delivery of broken halberds to be made to Othran, one of their number at the bottom of their hillside outpost.
Deliver the broken halberds to Othran at Tyrn Lhuig in Angmar
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver broken halberds from the goblins surrounding Tyrn Lhuig to Othran at the bottom of the hillside outpost.
Wanted: Broken halberds from the goblins surrounding Tyrn Lhuig.
